content.title: COMPLAINTS HANDLING PROCEDURE
sections: 1. OUR COMMITMENT: We are committed to providing excellent service. If we fall short, we want to put things right.

2. HOW TO COMPLAIN:

Email: [COMPLAINTS_EMAIL]
Phone: [COMPLAINTS_PHONE]
Post: Complaints Department, [COMPANY_NAME], [ADDRESS]
Online: [COMPLAINTS_FORM_URL]

3. WHAT TO INCLUDE:
- Your name and contact details
- Account/policy number
- Description of complaint
- What you would like us to do
- Any supporting documents

4. OUR PROCESS:

**Acknowledgement**: We will acknowledge your complaint within 5 business days (or sooner if we can resolve it).

**Investigation**: We will investigate fairly and impartially. We may contact you for more information.

**Resolution**: We aim to resolve complaints within:
- 3 business days (prompt resolution by close of 3rd business day)
- 8 weeks maximum (final response or holding response)

5. SUMMARY RESOLUTION:

If we can resolve your complaint within 3 business days, we will send you a summary resolution communication confirming resolution and informing you of your right to refer to Financial Ombudsman Service if not satisfied.

6. FINAL RESPONSE:

If not resolved within 3 days, we will send a final response within 8 weeks, including:
- Our decision (uphold, partially uphold, or reject)
- Explanation and evidence
- Any offer of redress
- Your right to refer to Financial Ombudsman Service within 6 months
- FOS contact details

7. IF NOT RESOLVED IN 8 WEEKS:

If we cannot provide a final response within 8 weeks, we will:
- Explain why
- Indicate when we expect to provide final response
- Inform you of your right to refer to FOS

8. FINANCIAL OMBUDSMAN SERVICE (FOS):

If you are not satisfied with our response, or we have not responded within 8 weeks, you may refer your complaint to FOS free of charge.

**Eligibility**: Consumers, micro-enterprises, small charities, small trusts

**Deadline**: Within 6 months of our final response

**Contact FOS**:
- Website: www.financial-ombudsman.org.uk
- Phone: 0800 023 4567 (free) or 0300 123 9123
- Email: complaint.info@financial-ombudsman.org.uk
- Post: Financial Ombudsman Service, Exchange Tower, London E14 9SR

FOS can award compensation up to £430,000 (2025 limit for complaints about acts/omissions from 1 April 2025).

9. RECORD KEEPING:

We maintain records of all complaints for at least 5 years (or 3 years from resolution for MiFID complaints).

10. ROOT CAUSE ANALYSIS:

We analyze complaints to identify root causes and improve our services.

11. COMPLAINTS DATA:

We report complaints data to the FCA twice a year and publish aggregate data [on our website/on request].
content.fca_disp_requirements:
Under DISP:
- 5-day acknowledgement (unless resolved)
- 3-day summary resolution option
- 8-week final response deadline
- FOS referral rights in final response
- 6-month FOS referral period
- Maintain complaints records 5 years (3 for MiFID)
- Report to FCA twice yearly
- Root cause analysis

compliance_checklist: FOS award limit stated (£430,000 from April 2025)
